display_long_description:
Butterfly Boost is an enchanting exergame designed for rehabilitation and physical therapy, blending engaging gameplay with functional movement exercises. In this game, players train walking and turning by inviting butterflies to land on their fingers and guiding them to flowers of the same color. The challenge continues until every flower has a butterfly perched on it, creating a colorful and rewarding experience.

Perfect for use in rehabilitation centers and physical therapy programs, Butterfly Boost is tailored for individuals recovering from injuries, surgeries, or those aiming to enhance their balance and mobility. The game encourages players to practice essential movements such as walking, turning, and reaching, all while immersed in a calming yet stimulating activity. Guiding the butterflies helps improve coordination, precision, and spatial awareness, transforming therapy into an enjoyable journey.

Whether you're focusing on rebuilding strength or refining your mobility, Butterfly Boost offers a delightful and effective way to achieve your goals. It motivates patients to actively participate in their therapy, making it a fun and engaging alternative to conventional exercises.

**(!) Butterfly Boost is part of the larger HoloMoves package, a subscription service offering a wide variety of exergames specifically designed for rehabilitation and physical therapy. Get a personal license and learn more at www.holomoves.nl/en**
